DOC.brief_title: Trial Effect Timing Cholecystectomy During Initial Admission Mild Gallstone Pancreatitis
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose study perform single-center randomize trial compare laparoscopic cholecystectomy intraoperative cholangiogram ( IOC ) within 24 hour presentation versus clinical resolution index admission mild gallstone pancreatitis clinical patient-reported outcome . Additionally , study aim determine patient ' value preference influence decision-making regard treatment option gallstone pancreatitis . Hypothesis : During index admission mild gallstone pancreatitis , early cholecystectomy within 24 hour presentation regardless symptoms laboratory value versus clinical resolution result shorter 30-day total hospital length stay .
